channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Morava K-theory of orthogonal groups and motives of projective quadrics
item.description: arXiv:2011.14720v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We compute the algebraic Morava K-theory ring of split special orthogonal and spin groups. In particular, we establish certain stabilization results for the Morava K-theory of special orthogonal and spin groups. Besides, we apply these results to study Morava motivic decompositions of orthogonal Grassmannians. For instance, we determine all indecomposable summands of the Morava motives of a generic quadric.
item.dc:creator: Nikita Geldhauser, Andrei Lavrenov, Victor Petrov, Pavel Sechin

item.title: Loop homology of moment-angle complexes in the flag case
item.description: arXiv:2403.18450v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We develop a general homological approach to presentations of connected graded associative algebras, and apply it to loop homology of moment-angle complexes $Z_K$ that correspond to flag simplicial complexes $K$. For arbitrary coefficient ring, we describe generators of the Pontryagin algebra $H_*(\Omega Z_K)$ and defining relations between them. We prove that such moment-angle complexes are coformal over $\mathbb{Q},$ give a necessary condition for rational formality, and compute their homotopy groups in terms of homotopy groups of spheres.
item.dc:creator: Fedor Vylegzhanin
